A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an utter disappointment this movie was.  I honestly left the theater actually upset by what these new people did to my beloved franchise.  This latest installment of Star Wars has the most pointless plot\, giant plot holes\, ridiculous humor\, cheesy scenes and annyoing new characters (I'm looking at you\, Rose).  \n\nPlease\, Disney\, restore our original story here.  The Force Awakens laid groundwork for a great story to be told and you took a match to it.  I am saddened to say this after spending 44 years of my life invested in this galaxy far\, far away\, but I think I am done with Star Wars.
